content: introducing my down by the sea blanket this was a 6 week crochet-along cal which i hosted in november - december 2022 the full printer friendly pdf pattern is now available there are plenty of step-by-step photos and detailed video tutorials free on my website in 6 weekly instalments it s a blanket with plenty of detail but also many rounds and row of simpler stitches so i m hoping for a gentle coastal inspired cal in the lead up to christmas bringing a little calm and focus plus those crocheting along will have a gift to give or keep just in time for christmas the finished blanket measures approximately 115cm x 90cm 45in x 35in for all the details plus yarn quantities needed do head over to my website for all the information https //coastalcrochet com/2022/10/14/introducing-down-by-the-sea/ 1 1 https //coastalcrochet com/2022/10/14/introducing-down-by-the-sea/
